00070 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00071 //include protection
00072 #ifndef HASHWRAPPER_H
00073 #define HASHWRAPPER_H
00074 
00075 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00076 //STL includes
00077 #include <string>
00078 
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00080 //C includes
00081 #include <stdio.h>
00082 
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00084 //hashlib++ includes
00085 #include "hl_exception.h"
00086 
00087 //----------------------------------------------------------------------        
00088 
00105 class hashwrapper
00106 {
00107         protected:
00108 
00118                 virtual std::string hashIt(void) = 0;
00119 
00131                 virtual std::string convToString(unsigned char *data) = 0;
00132 
00143                 virtual void updateContext(unsigned char *data, unsigned int len) = 0;
00144 
00152                 virtual void resetContext(void) = 0;
00153 
00154         public:
00155 
00159                 virtual ~hashwrapper ( void ) { };
00160 
00174                 virtual std::string getHashFromString(std::string text)
00175                 {
00176                         /*
00177                          * reset the context so that we can start
00178                          * with a new hash process
00179                          */
00180                         resetContext();
00181 
00182                         /*
00183                          * we update the context with the given text
00184                          */
00185                         updateContext((unsigned char*) text.c_str(),text.length());
00186 
00187                         /*
00188                          * now we can close the hash process 
00189                          * and return the created hash
00190                          */
00191                         return this->hashIt(); 
00192                 }
00193 
00211                 virtual std::string getHashFromFile(std::string filename)
00212                 {
00213 
00214                         FILE *file;
00215                         int len;
00216                         unsigned char buffer[1024];
00217 
00218                         /*
00219                          * reset the current hash context
00220                          */
00221                         resetContext();
00222 
00223                         /*
00224                          * open the specified file
00225                          */
00226                         if ((file = fopen (filename.c_str(), "rb")) == NULL)
00227                         {
00228                                 throw hlException(HL_FILE_READ_ERROR,
00229                                                   "Cannot read file \"" + 
00230                                                   filename + 
00231                                                   "\".");
00232                         }
00233 
00234                         /*
00235                          * read the file in 1024b blocks and
00236                          * update the context for every block
00237                          */
00238                         while ( (len = fread (buffer, 1, 1024, file)) )
00239                         {
00240                                 updateContext(buffer, len);
00241                         }
00242 
00243                         /*
00244                          * close the file and 
00245                          * return the hash
00246                          */
00247                         fclose(file);
00248                         return (hashIt());
00249                 }
00250 };
00251
